column1: Storia is a brand amplification agency that combines the unceasing creativity of a design studio with the strategic ingenuity of performance marketing into a one stop shop. This gives our team the opportunity to craft  sharpen & hone transformative brand narratives that drive results for the client and action for the audience.We are currently looking for a Copywriter with 2-4 years of experience working at digital marketing agencies. The copywriter will work in partnership with graphic design teams across a diverse portfolio of brands with projects spanning paid advertising (search & social)  website design  SEO content and email marketing. A great attitude and strong work ethic is a must.Responsibilities:Craft compelling copy across various marketing channels including paid advertising  email marketing  presentations  website and blogsMaintain consistency in tone of voice when writing for brands across multiple placements & platforms  and create variations based on what works best for each channelCollaborate with cross-functional teams  such as project managers and designers  to ensure alignment and create impactful copy that compliments the visual materialsMaintain proactive communication with the project team to ensure timely delivery of all copy-related deliverablesParticipate in creative and strategic discussions  as well as contribute to client presentationsEffectively articulate and present copy concepts and ideas to internal teams and clientsAddress and incorporate internal and client feedback to refine and enhance copywritingThoroughly proofread all copy and ensure it’s ready for launchStay up-to-date on client-related industry trends  social media trends  etc. Manage multiple high-volume projects concurrently  often with short turnaround timesRequired Skills & Experience: Proven experience in conversion or paid advertising copywritingStrong understanding of digital marketing and paid advertising2-4 years of experience in copywriting2-4 years experience at a marketing agency.Speaks fluent EnglishStrong command over grammar & spellingStrong presentation skillsStrong oral and written communication skills requiredStrong organizational  communication and conceptual thinking skills  as well as attention to detail(Preferred) Fluency in SpanishTime Requirement: 40 Hours per weekSchedule: Monday to Friday  9am - 5pm ESTPlease provide a portfolio or writing examples along with your resume. Job Title:-Content WriterLocation:-RemoteCandidate need to be bilingual- (Spanish and English)Job Summary:-We are seeking experienced and knowledgeable Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) in the field of Englishto join our team. As an SME  you will play a critical role in building data sets for large language model training (similar to ChatGPT  Bard  Bing  and HuggingChat  for example). Your role will include writing/authoring responses to a wide range of prompts in your field of expertise  which will enable us to enhance the capabilities and knowledge base of our language model. Responsibilities• Create/generate high-quality responses to given prompts across a wide variety of topics within your field of knowledge  from simple to more complex levels of difficulty. • Exhibit exceptional expertise in creative English writing within your field of knowledge  while making sure to utilize: o Reliable and relevant sources to gather information and facts for your responses. o Appropriate and consistent language  tone  and style for your responses. o Creative and engaging techniques to make your responses interesting. • Conduct in-depth research to gather precise and relevant information to provide an accurate response. • Ensure the accuracy  coherence  clarity  and quality of your response. • Provide constructive feedback and valuable insight regarding techniques and strategies for writing responses. • Contribute to the continuous improvement of our language model by identifying potential areas of enhancement and suggesting new prompt ideas. • Collaborate with other SMEs to maintain consistency and quality across the prompt generation process.   Requirements• Bachelor’s to master’s (or higher) degree in English from Top Tier colleges. .• US Native level English proficiency   well versed with writing and reading in their language  with excellent written and verbal communication skills. • Working experience in content writing  blogging  problem-solution writing  and editing of text.• Demonstrated ability to generate clear  concise  and engaging content. • Strong research skills and ability to gather information from credible sources. • Familiarity with large language models and their applications is a plus. • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines. • Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work. • Flexibility to adapt to changing project requirements and priorities. • Collaborative mindset and willingness to work with a multidisciplinary team. • Excellent US English and strong US Popular culture are both mandatory.• Eye for current events  interests in recent and most popular trends  understanding social media lingo  Social Media Intelligence Quotient• Strong disciplined in compliance in the speedy environment.• Creative writing  creative technical writing & feature writing experiences; Exposure to multiple genres• Strong spoken English or "English Language Verbal Intelligence"
